readme:
# Will-o'-Wisp

Like a will-o'-wisp in the night – a cold, dark syntax theme.

A theme that exclusively uses cold colors. Warm colors are reserved for errors, warnings, TODOs and the like. With unobtrusive punctuation and additional tweaks for certain languages like markdown, Will-o'-Wisp makes it easy to focus on what's important.

## Recommended packages

- [language-markdown](https://atom.io/packages/language-markdown)
- [language-babel](https://atom.io/packages/language-babel)

## Examples

![example-markdown](./examples/img/example-md.png)
![example-html](./examples/img/example-html.png)
![example-js](./examples/img/example-js.png)
